title: Colorado Petroleum Council calls on Congress to fix the unnecessary ozone regulations (API - American ...
text: ( Source : API - American Petroleum Institute ) DENVER, October 1, 2015 - Congress must move legislation to slow EPA 's rush to further tighten regulations on ozone that could be the costliest regulation ever imposed on Coloradoans, even as
